Meryl.1: Seventyfive, then she couldn't take it anymore. You up for some table tennis?
Meryl.2: You look so rough, I can sand you if you want...
Meryl.3: True, but she also told me you're a very sturdy lover. I wonder how it'd feel. *smirk*
Meryl.-1: I'm sorry but I didn't steal her from you, that sofa already wanted to leave you.

Armoise.1: You finallì grew tired of that summer love of yours, didn't you?
Armoise.2: I still reminisce about caressing your strong legs like I did back then, they left a splinter in my heart.
Armoise.3: To this day I keep your flowerì cloths neatlì folded under my pillow, and with every night, I dream of you.
Armoise.11: You made the right choice, I always despised that sofa. Does your 'eart have a new home now?
Armoise.12: I still reminisce about caressing your strong legs like I did back then, they left a splinter in my heart.
Armoise.13: To this day I keep your flowerì cloths neatlì folded under my pillow, and with every night, I dream of you.
Armoise.-1: Sacré bleu, I wasn't expecting you! It feels like an era already passed by.
